Package com.yardi.shared.userServices

Class PasswordStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yardi.shared.userServices.PasswordStatistics
  • public class PasswordStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
    Several password rules rely on scanning the password as a char [] to determine whether the password contains upper case, lower case, etc.

    Rather than duplicating that scan logic for each rule, this class performs a single scan on the password and accumulates statistics that can be checked to determine whether a password complies with password policy.
    Author:
    Jim
